title: Arthritis
markdown:
# Arthritis topics
There are many types of conditions that cause joint pain and inflammation, known as arthritis. Here you can learn more about the main types of arthritis, including symptoms, causes, treatments and self-care techniques. We also provide links to a range of resources, apps and videos.
